agents.name: Astra
agents.description: Astra is a versatile Controller who uses her stars to manipulate the battlefield with her smokes, gravity wells, and a powerful cosmic divide.

abilities.name: Gravity Well
abilities.description: Astra's Gravity Well is a device that pulls in enemies and creates a burst of force, disrupting the enemy’s movements.

abilities.name: Nebula
abilities.description: Nebula allows Astra to create a large sphere of smoke, providing cover and blocking vision.

abilities.name: Stars
abilities.description: Astra uses Stars as a tool to manipulate the map, including the Gravity Well and Nebula abilities.

abilities.name: Cosmic Divide
abilities.description: Astra's ultimate ability, Cosmic Divide, creates a massive divide that blocks sound and vision, giving Astra’s team control of a large area.

agents.name: Jett
agents.description: Jett is a fast-moving, high-damage Duelist who excels at agile playstyles with abilities that allow her to dash and control the air.

abilities.name: Cloudburst
abilities.description: Jett uses Cloudburst to throw a small cloud of smoke, providing cover for herself and her team.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.description: Tailwind is Jett’s mobility ability that lets her dash quickly across the map, repositioning or escaping danger.

abilities.name: Updraft
abilities.description: Updraft lets Jett propel herself vertically, gaining a high ground advantage.

abilities.name: Ultimate: Tailwind
abilities.description: Jett's ultimate ability allows her to unleash an incredibly rapid dash with more aggressive positioning.

agents.name: Sage
agents.description: Sage is a supportive Sentinel who excels at healing and area control, using her abilities to revive teammates, slow enemies, and create defensive barriers to hold strategic positions.

abilities.name: Barrier Orb
abilities.descriptiion: Sage uses Barrier Orb to create a large, solid wall that blocks vision and movement.

abilities.name: Resurrection
abilities.description: Sage's ultimate ability, Resurrection, allows her to revive a fallen teammate to full health.

abilities.name: Slow Orb
abilities.description: Slow Orb is Sage's ability that creates a field that slows enemies who pass through it.

abilities.name: Healing
abilities.description: Sage uses Healing Orb to heal herself or her teammates over time.

agents.name: Gekko
agents.description: Gekko is an Initiator with a unique set of creature companions that help him clear angles, detain enemies, and support his team with utility. His versatile abilities allow him to disrupt opponents while providing recon and crowd control.

abilities.name: Mosh Pit
abilities.description: Gekko's Mosh Pit ability sends his creature companion to a target location, where it creates a field that slows and damages enemies.

abilities.name: Dizzy
abilities.description: Dizzy is Gekko's creature companion that can be sent to a target location to disorient and confuse enemies.

abilities.name: Wingman
abilities.description: Wingman is Gekko's creature companion that can be sent to a target location to provide recon and reveal enemy positions.

abilities.name: Thrash
abilities.description: Gekko's ultimate ability, Thrash, sends his creature companion to a target location, where it creates a field that stuns and damages enemies.

agents.name: Brimstone
agents.description: Brimstone is a tactical commander who deploys long-range smokes and powerful area denial tools to control the battlefield.

abilities.name: Stim Beacon
abilities.description: Launches an incendiary grenade that deploys a damaging field of fire.

abilities.name: Sky Smoke
abilities.description: Deploys a beacon that grants rapid-fire to allies who enter its radius.

abilities.name: Incendiary
abilities.description: Deploys long-range, targeted smokescreens for strategic coverage.

abilities.name: Orbital Strike
abilities.description: Calls down a devastating orbital laser that deals high damage over time in a targeted area.

agents.name: Phoenix
agents.description: Phoenix uses fire-based abilities to curve flashes, block vision, and heal himself in combat.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Throws a flare orb that bursts into a blinding flash after a brief delay.

abilities.name: Hot Hands
abilities.description: Throws a fireball that explodes after a delay or on impact, healing Phoenix and damaging enemies.

abilities.name: Curveball
abilities.description: Creates a wall of fire that blocks vision and damages anyone passing through.

abilities.name: Run It Back
abilities.description: Marks Phoenix’s current location. If he dies during the ability’s duration, he is reborn at that location.

agents.name: Breach
agents.description: Breach is an initiator who uses seismic blasts to force enemies out of position and clear tight spaces.

abilities.name: Aftershock
abilities.description: Fires a fast-acting flash through a wall to blind enemies on the other side.

abilities.name: Fault Line
abilities.description: Equips a seismic blast that dazes enemies in a line across the map.

abilities.name: Flashpoint
abilities.description: Fires a burst through a wall that explodes multiple times and deals heavy damage.

abilities.name: Rolling Thunder
abilities.description: Unleashes a wide quake that dazes and knocks up all enemies in its path.

agents.name: Cypher
agents.description: Cypher is an intelligence agent who gathers crucial enemy information with his network of surveillance devices.

abilities.name: Trapwire
abilities.description: Sets a tripwire between two walls, revealing and dazing enemies who cross it.

abilities.name: Spycam
abilities.description: Throws a remote-activated trap that slows enemies who pass through it.

abilities.name: Cyber Cage
abilities.description: Places a remote camera that can be used to watch areas and fire tracking darts.

abilities.name: Neural Theft
abilities.description: Reveals the location of all remaining enemies by using a recently deceased enemy’s body.

agents.name: Omen
agents.description: Omen is a shadowy figure who obscures vision, teleports across the map, and blinds enemies.

abilities.name: Shrouded Step
abilities.description: Teleports to a nearby location instantly.

abilities.name: Dark Cover
abilities.description: Sends out a shadowy projectile that blinds all enemies it passes through.

abilities.name: Paranoia
abilities.description: Casts a smoke orb that can be steered in the air and obscures vision.

abilities.name: From the Shadows
abilities.description: Allows Omen to teleport anywhere on the map. If killed during the teleport, he returns to the original location.

agents.name: Reyna
agents.description: Reyna thrives on eliminations, becoming stronger with every kill. She’s designed to carry and clutch rounds using her self-sustain and evasive powers.

abilities.name: Leer
abilities.description: Casts an ethereal eye that nearsights all enemies who look at it.

abilities.name: Dismiss
abilities.description: Consumes a Soul Orb left by a kill to rapidly heal for a short duration.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Consumes a Soul Orb to become intangible and invulnerable for a short duration.

abilities.name: Empress
abilities.description: Enters a frenzy, increasing fire rate, healing on kills, and enabling the use of enhanced versions of her abilities.

agents.name: Sova
agents.description: Sova reveals and tracks enemies using high-tech arrows and a recon drone, excelling in intel gathering and long-range engagements.

abilities.name: Owl Drone
abilities.description: Deploys a drone to scout and tag enemies with a dart.

abilities.name: Recon Bolt
abilities.description: Fires a bolt that explodes and deals AoE damage.

abilities.name: Shock Bolt
abilities.description: Fires a sonar arrow that reveals enemies in its line of sight.

abilities.name: Hunter's Fury
abilities.description: Launches up to three long-range energy blasts that deal damage and reveal enemies across the map.

agents.name: Killjoy
agents.description: Killjoy is a German tech expert who locks down sites with traps, bots, and a game-changing lockdown device.

abilities.name: Nanoswarm
abilities.description: Throws a grenade that releases a swarm of nanobots, dealing damage.

abilities.name: Turret
abilities.description: Deploys a bot that hunts down enemies and applies a debuff.

abilities.name: Alarmbot
abilities.description: Deploys a turret that fires at enemies in a 180-degree cone.

abilities.name: Lockdown
abilities.description: Deploys a device that detains all enemies in a large radius after a wind-up.

agents.name: Viper
agents.description: Viper uses poisonous gas and acid to control the battlefield, zoning and damaging enemies who enter her toxic areas.

abilities.name: Snake Bite
abilities.description: Launches a canister that shatters into a pool of acid.

abilities.name: Toxic Screen
abilities.description: Throws a gas emitter that can be reactivated to emit a toxic smoke cloud.

abilities.name: Poison Cloud
abilities.description: Deploys a long wall of gas emitters that can emit a tall toxic wall.

abilities.name: Viper's Pit
abilities.description: Creates a large cloud that obscures vision and decays enemies’ health inside.

agents.name: Raze
agents.description: Raze is an explosive expert who flushes enemies out of cover with bombs and powerful blasts.

abilities.name: Boom Bot
abilities.description: Deploys a bot that bounces off walls and explodes on contact with enemies.

abilities.name: Paint Shells
abilities.description: Throws a satchel charge that sticks to surfaces and can be detonated to deal damage or boost movement.

abilities.name: Blast Pack
abilities.description: Throws a cluster grenade that deals high area damage.

abilities.name: Showstopper
abilities.description: Launches a rocket launcher that deals massive damage in a large radius.

agents.name: KAY/O
agents.description: KAY/O is a machine built for suppression, preventing enemies from using abilities and giving his team a tactical advantage.

abilities.name: FRAG/ment
abilities.description: Throws an explosive fragment that sticks to surfaces and explodes multiple times.

abilities.name: ZERO/point
abilities.description: Throws a flash grenade that explodes after a short wind-up.

abilities.name: FLASH/drive
abilities.description: Throws a suppressing knife that disables enemy abilities in a radius.

abilities.name: NULL/cmd
abilities.description: Overloads KAY/O’s systems, emitting pulses that suppress enemies and allowing him to be revived if downed.
